events.message: I received my order last week but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning refund and return.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and manage the case.
Hello! Thanks for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund, and I'm here to assist you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can process it as quickly as possible?
The order number is 123456789, and the product did not match the description on your website, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and provide a prepaid return label for sending the product back.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and for making the process easy for me.
Your refund has been processed, and the return label has been sent to your email. Please let us know when the item is shipped back.
We are following up to ensure you received the return label and that the refund process is going smoothly.
The refund case is now closed as the return has been received and your money refunded. Thank you for your patience.
